example.eg: The plants in my garden are growing strongly.
example.egtrans: 我花园里的植物正在茁壮成长。

example.eg: The wind was blowing so strongly, I could barely stand up.
example.egtrans: 风刮得很猛，我几乎站不住。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 有力地, 强烈地，猛烈地

example.eg: The villagers strongly objected to the plans for a new motorway just half a mile from their homes.
example.egtrans: 村民强烈反对在距离他们家园仅半英里的地方新建高速公路的计划。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 强烈地, 非常激烈地

example.eg: Tom voiced his opinion strongly in a letter to the council when the garbage collectors failed to collect his trash for the second week in a row.
example.egtrans: 收垃圾的连续两周没来收垃圾，汤姆给理事会写信强烈表达了自己的意见。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 强有力地，强大地, 有说服力地

example.eg: The man's breath smelled strongly of whiskey.
example.egtrans: 那个男人的呼吸中带有浓烈的威士忌味道。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 明显地，显而易见地, 浓烈地，浓重地

dsense.name: feel strongly one way or the other
